# kCFUserNotificationNoteAlertLevel

**Global Variable**

The notification is not very serious.

## Declaration

```swift
var kCFUserNotificationNoteAlertLevel: CFOptionFlags { get }
```

## Discussion

A note icon is displayed by default.

## Constants

- **kCFUserNotificationStopAlertLevel**: The notification is very serious.
- **kCFUserNotificationCautionAlertLevel**: The notification is somewhat serious.
- **kCFUserNotificationPlainAlertLevel**: The notification is not serious.
title: kCFUserNotificationNoteAlertLevel
